title: BONDMAXX 2025 - Harmony Color Collection
descriptionn: The BONDMAXX 2025 color collection, named 'Harmony', celebrates the beauty of subtle shades and perfect harmony. The collection includes over 360 colors distributed across 12 color categories, each carefully designed to meet the highest aesthetic and functional standards.
searchPlaceholder: Search for colors or hex codes...
tryModifyingSearch: Try modifying your search or filter
full_product_description: Bondmax Economy Paint - An economical water-based emulsion paint for interior use, featuring ease of use, quick drying, and excellent surface coverage. It has high flowability and is an ideal choice for ceilings, storage rooms, and stairs where high wash or dirt resistance is not required. Odorless, providing a smooth, non-glossy finish that lasts long.
feature_1: Excellent coverage and high surface transparency
feature_3: Virtually odorless and free of harmful compounds
feature_4: Suitable for ceilings, storage rooms, and stairs
feature_5: Resistant to cracking and dirt in light use
feature_6: Available in white and thousands of colors within the BONDMAXX system
usage_step_1: Ensure surface is dry and free of dust and grease
usage_step_3: Apply two coats diluted with 10–20% clean water
usage_step_4: Apply second coat after first one is completely dry
usage_step_6: Clean tools with water immediately after finishing
storage_info_1: Shelf life: 24 months in original unopened container
storage_info_2: Store away from direct sunlight and frost
about_bondmaxx_subtitle: We bring colors to life and make them part of your business success ✨
about_bondmaxx_paragraph_1: BONDMAXX is a leading company in the manufacturing of high-quality paints and coatings, specially designed to meet the needs of wholesalers and distributors seeking products that combine excellent performance, exceptional beauty, and high commercial value.
about_bondmaxx_paragraph_2: At BONDMAXX, we rely on environmentally-friendly German raw materials to ensure long-lasting quality and full compliance with global environmental sustainability standards. We also use the latest American manufacturing technologies to ensure color accuracy, stability, and ideal coverage that reflects the highest levels of innovation in this field.
about_bondmaxx_paragraph_3: The production process is carried out with Lebanese expertise spanning over twenty years in the paint and coatings manufacturing industry, giving our products a unique balance between traditional expertise and modern technical precision.
about_bondmaxx_paragraph_4: Thanks to this extensive experience and advanced technologies, BONDMAXX offers more than 360 colors and a wide range of specialized coatings that meet the needs of residential, commercial, and industrial projects alike.
about_bondmaxx_paragraph_5: Because we understand the importance of efficiency and competitiveness in the wholesale market, we provide our customers with flexible and competitive prices that enable them to achieve the highest profit margins without any compromise on quality.
choose_bondmaxx: Choose BONDMAXX for an Exceptional Experience
elevate_experience: BONDMAXX Global expertise, German quality, American technology, and Lebanese craftsmanship that makes the difference
industries_description: We provide comprehensive and specialized painting solutions for various sectors, focusing on quality and innovation in every project.
residential_description: Ideal painting solutions for homes and apartments, providing lasting beauty and superior protection for interior and exterior walls.
commercial_description: Professional paints for offices, retail stores, and public facilities, combining elegant appearance with high durability.
industrial_description: Specialized industrial coatings that withstand harsh conditions and provide long-lasting protection for facilities and equipment.
marine_description: Marine paints resistant to water and salinity, specially designed to protect ships and marine facilities.
cta_description: Contact us now for a free consultation and start your journey toward achieving your ideal space.

collection_description: The BONDMAXX 2025 color collection, named 'Harmony', celebrates the impact of subtle shades and perfect harmony. The collection includes over 360 colors distributed across six main color categories, each carefully designed to meet the finest aesthetic and functional standards.
exterior_description: Protect your home's facade with the best exterior paints from BondMax. A diverse range of weather-resistant paints with stable, long-lasting colors that give your facade a distinctive modern look.
bondmax_ultra_description: Maximum protection against harsh weather conditions.
bondmax_modern_description: A modern touch for your home's facade.
insulation_description: Protect your home or office with the best insulation solutions from BondMax. A diverse range of thermal and acoustic insulation to ensure comfort and high efficiency.
thermal_bondmax_premium_desc: Maintains ideal temperature inside the building.
thermal_bondmax_villas_desc: Keeps cool in summer and warm in winter.
interior_description: Shop BondMax products. Discover our diverse range of high-quality paints and choose colors that add protection and beauty to your walls at the same time.

faq_question_1: How do I find the nearest store?
faq_answer_1: Use the 'Use My Location' button or enter your city name in the search box to find the nearest store.
faq_answer_2: Yes, most of our stores offer free delivery for orders exceeding a certain value.
faq_answer_3: We accept cash on delivery, credit cards, and bank transfers.
faq_question_4: Can I get a free consultation?
faq_answer_4: Yes, all our stores offer free consultations from paint experts to help you choose the right product.
privacy_policy_text: We value your privacy. Bondmaxx collects personal information only to provide our services. Your data will not be shared with third parties without your consent. We use cookies to improve your browsing experience.
data_protection_text: Bondmaxx complies with all applicable data protection laws, including GDPR. You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time.
